exports.name: EventBus
exports.description: The main event bus class that implements pub-sub pattern for event management. Provides methods to subscribe, publish, and manage event handlers.

exports.name: EventHandler
exports.description: A generic handler function type that receives a payload of any type. Signature: (payload: T) => void

exports.name: EventBusOptions
exports.description: Configuration interface for EventBus instantiation. Contains maxListeners (number) and debug (boolean) options.

exports.name: subscribe
exports.description: Register a handler for an event on an EventBus instance. Returns an unsubscribe function. Throws error if maxListeners limit is exceeded.

exports.name: once
exports.description: Register a one-time handler that automatically removes itself after the first event invocation.

exports.name: unsubscribe
exports.description: Remove a previously registered handler from an event. Returns true if the handler was found and removed.

exports.name: publish
exports.description: Emit an event with optional payload to all registered handlers. Returns the count of handlers invoked.

exports.name: clear
exports.description: Remove all handlers for a specific event, or clear all events if no event parameter is specified.

exports.name: getSubscriberCount
exports.description: Get the number of handlers currently registered for a specific event.

exports.name: listEvents
exports.description: Get an array of all event names that currently have at least one registered handler.
